short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet Croissant—a shopping tool for effortless reselling.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop with Guaranteed Resale Prices
The Croissant Chrome extension gives you access to guaranteed resale prices while you shop, we call them Guaranteed Buybacks™.

Available at your Favorite Brands and Retailers
Croissant partners with over 150 brands and retailers such as Shopbop, SSENSE and Neiman Marcus—and we’re adding more everyday.

Build your Collection, Sell in One Click, and Get Paid Out Instantly
Download our app to manage your buybacks in your account. When you’re ready, you can sell your items in one click and get paid out instantly after shipping your item(s) to Croissant.

Croissant is completely free to use. When you shop with Croissant, retailers provide us a commission for the items added to your collection. This is how we offer you an effortless resale experience.
